Title: streamingLandingIntro
Content:
Hi. Welcome to Crossroads Anywhere.

This isn't your average "church TV." We're groups of people meeting in person every week to explore who God is in a language we can understand. Whether you're exploring whether or not God exists or a you’re committed Christ-follower, we're glad you’re here.

On this page, you can attend a Crossroads service, find friends nearby and learn more about hosting in your own home.

Title: streamingLandingCurrentSeries
Content:
TOGETHER: How to Make & Keep Better Friends RUNS: August 6th - August 28th

Lone wolves, rugged individualists, and detached hermits all have one thing in common: they die. God created us to thrive TOGETHER. But it's not always easy. Join us as we talk about how to make TOGETHER work for all of us.

Topics covered:
friends, #letsbetogether, groups

Watch Trailer

Title: streamingLandingCommunity
Content:
We Are Where You Are

Crossroads Anywhere is more than "church TV." It's friends and neighbors meeting across the country in living rooms to hear a relevant, biblical message we can apply to our everyday lives.

Title: streamingLandingHostIntro
Content:
Create a Community Where You Are

We believe growth happens in community. It's kinda our thing.

Take the next step and open up your home for the weekend service. You can do this by becoming a host. This is the place to start your community and get the resources to make it awesome.

Title: streamingLandingHostTips
Content:
Tips for Hosting

You gather the people, we'll bring the awesome. Here are the basics of hosting a killer weekend service.

  • Don't sweat the details. People want to hang out with you and the service will be great.
  • Pick a space. Like your living room. Somewhere people can gather, talk, and hang out.
  • Crank up the volume. It's way easier to sing along when your friends can't hear you.
  • Oh, and brew some coffee. It's Crossroads, after all.

Title: streamingLandingHostBecome
Content:
Become a Host

Let's make it official. Sign up to be a Host and we'll get you everything you need to have awesome weekend services. You'll get weekly updates, tips to prepare for service, and a connection to a community of hosts all over the country.

Become a Host

Title: streamingLandingHostKids
Content:
Just for Kids

Not quite sure what to do with your kids during service? Want them to have a meaningful experience with God? We've got you covered.

Our Just for Kids tool has lesson ideas, videos, hosting tips and activities–everything you need to give your kids a great weekend experience, no matter their age.

Download the PDF

Title: streamingLandingPastWeekend1
Content:
You can’t say that in church

Brian Tome talks about what people think should and shouldn’t be allowed to say in church.

Title: streamingLandingPastWeekend2
Content:
The Unparalleled Power of Community & Data and Discovering Why God Made You

Matt Welty talks about how important community is to your personal and spiritual growth. Dave Kinnaman talks about the importance of work and how it is God's design for our lives.

Title: streamingLandingPastWeekend3
Content:
We stand Undivided

Chuck Mingo talks about community and how to respond to the terrible race-related violence and rising tensions in our country.

Title: streamingLandingPastWeekend4
Content:
Why my daughter will fail statistics. & How a suitcase and $800 changed my life.

Latasha Patrick talks about how being a single mother left her determined for her and her daughter to not fall to statics. Paco Pancham talks about how having faith and taking a risk changed his family's life with $800 and a suitcase.
